title: ISO 8601-1:2019 Ordinal Date and Local Time of Day with Hourly Time Shift (Extended Format)
description: A representation of ordinal date combined with complete local time of day and time shift from UTC in extended format [YYYY]["-"][DDD]["T"][hh][":"[mm][":"[ss][±][hh] where the time shift includes only hours (§5.4.2.2 b)
